Kankurō has [[Sanshōuo]] tackle the opponent from underneath the ground, immediately after which [[Karasu]] catches the opponent mid-air and carries them into [[Kuroari]]. The puppet then triggers an explosion, but not before splitting its parts to sustain itself from damage.

== Trivia ==
* A "[[wikipedia:Kyōgen|kyōgen]]" is a form of Japanese theatre.
